title: User Event Schema
description: Schema definition for user-related notification events.

event_key.description: A unique key for the user-related event.

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the event.

priority.description: The urgency level of the notification.

channels.description: Channels through which the notification should be sent.

roles.description: Roles that should receive this event's notification.

fallback_message.description: Optional fallback message if the template is missing.

template_key.description: Optional reference to the notification template key.

enabled.description: If false, this event is ignored.
